item.title: How do i add drops
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

To make an NPC drop an item when killed, follow this tutorial.

Open up NPCHandler.java in notepad, and hit control+f and in the search box, type this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1605

You should see stuff like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(6570, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

The above is the code that tells the server when TzTok-Jad is killed, he must drop one single Fire Cape.

To change the item, change the 6570 in this line of code below (representing the Item ID), and the 1 before GetNpcKiller (indicating how many of that item).

So lets say we wanted NPC 1000 to drop a cape with the ID of 4399. The code would look like this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1000 { ItemHandler.addItem(4399, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Add more drops(lines) as you wish.

Simple.

Read full topic
